resources.string: Login to your existing account to access all the features in Zwallet
Create your account to access Zwallet.
Enter your Zwallet e-mail so we can send you a password reset link.
Create and confirm your new password so you can login to Zwallet.
We provide you virtual account number for top up via nearest ATM.
Go to the nearest ATM or you can use E-Banking.
Type your security number on the ATM or E-Banking.
Type the virtual account number that we provide you at the top.
Type the amount of the money you want to top up.
You can see your money in Zwallet within 3 hours.
We got your personal information from the sign up process. If you want to make changes on yout information contact our support.
Create a PIN that’s contain 6 digits number for security purpose in Zwallet.
Your PIN was successfully created and you can now access all the features in Zwallet. Login to your new account and start exploring!
We can’t transfer your money at the moment, we recommend you to check your internet connection and try again.
Enter your current 6 digits Zwallet PIN below to continue to the next steps.
Type your new 6 digits security PIN to use in Zwallet.
Enter your 6 digits PIN for confirmation to continue transferring money.
You must enter your current passsword and then type your new password twice.
